import React from "react"; import "./post.css"; import MoreVertIcon from "@material-ui/icons/MoreVert"; import {Users} from "../../dummyData"; const Post = ({post})=>{ const user = Users.filter(u=>u.id===1); console.log(user[0].username); return(
Porn girl {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
